trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>del controllo ridimensionato, è possibile eseguire il cast di `sender` parametro di tipo registrato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>metodo da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e ottenere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>proprietà (o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>proprietà singolarmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire layout personalizzati, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento anziché l'evento Resize.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a Resize event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>evento viene generato in risposta a un evento di ridimensionamento, ma anche in risposta ad altre modifiche che hanno effetto sul layout del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo viene ridisegnato quando è ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: The ResizeRedraw property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà ResizeRedraw è equivalente al valore restituito del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>metodo quando si passa il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>come parametro un valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il controllo viene ridisegnato quando è ridimensionato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: Riprende la consueta logica di layout.

trans-unit.source: Calling the ResumeLayout method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata al metodo ResumeLayout forza un layout immediato se vi sono richieste di layout in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and ResumeLayout methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e ResumeLayout vengono utilizzati insieme per eliminare più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventi durante la regolazione di più attributi del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the ResumeLayout method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, in genere chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>(metodo), quindi impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>le proprietà del controllo e quindi chiamare il metodo ResumeLayout per abilitare le modifiche diventino effettive.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for ResumeLayout to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Devono essere chiamate in sospeso per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>per ResumeLayout sia chiamato correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Riprende la consueta logica di layout, imponendo facoltativamente un layout immediato delle richieste di layout in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metodo impone un layout immediato se vi sono in attesa di richieste di layout.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `performLayout` parametro è impostato su `true`, si verifica un layout immediato se vi sono in attesa di richieste di layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>vengono utilizzati insieme per eliminare più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventi durante la regolazione di più attributi del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, in genere chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>(metodo), quindi impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>le proprietà del controllo e quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metodo per consentire le modifiche diventino effettive.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Devono essere chiamate in sospeso per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>sia chiamato correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si aggiungono più controlli a un controllo padre, è consigliabile chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metodo prima di inizializzare i controlli da aggiungere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'aggiunta di controlli al controllo padre, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Ciò aumenta le prestazioni delle applicazioni con molti controlli.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per eseguire in attesa di richieste di layout. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la distanza, espressa in pixel, tra il bordo destro del controllo e il bordo sinistro dell'area client del relativo contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà a destra è uguale alla somma dei valori di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>valore della proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Right property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di destra è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare il valore della proprietà indirettamente modificando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>proprietà o chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>che rappresenta la distanza, espressa in pixel, tra il bordo destro del controllo e il bordo sinistro dell'area client del relativo contenitore.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se gli elementi del controllo sono allineati per supportare le impostazioni locali utilizzando i caratteri da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RightToLeft è una proprietà di ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Una proprietà di ambiente è una proprietà del controllo che, se non impostato, viene recuperato dal controllo padre.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>avrà lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>come padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>per impostazione predefinita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle proprietà di ambiente, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RightToLeft è utilizzata per le applicazioni interne in cui la lingua è scritto da destra a sinistra, quale l'ebraico o l'arabo.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, gli elementi di controllo che includono testo vengono visualizzati da destra a sinistra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the RightToLeft property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se il valore della proprietà RightToLeft viene modificato in fase di esecuzione, viene mantenuto solo il testo non elaborato senza formattazione.

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the RightToLeft property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName> : - Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: Ecco alcuni esempi di come gli elementi di controllo interessati il valore della proprietà RightToLeft <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>:-vengono visualizzate barre di scorrimento verticale sul lato sinistro anziché sul lato destro dei controlli scorrevoli (ad esempio, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>su più righe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Barre di scorrimento orizzontale di iniziano con la casella di scorrimento (pulsante di scorrimento) allineata a destra.

trans-unit.source: - The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: -L'allineamento dell'elemento casella di controllo, applicando il `CheckAlign` proprietà, è invertita per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: - Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Gli elementi nella casella di riepilogo, casella combinata e controlli di scorrimento sono allineati a destra.

trans-unit.source: - Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Su e giù pulsanti sono allineati a sinistra in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: - Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) sono allineati a destra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: - The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: -L'allineamento dei pulsanti della barra degli strumenti in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controllo o l'allineamento del testo in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>non è interessato dalla proprietà RightToLeft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>supporta l'allineamento a destra a sinistra; tuttavia, l'effetto su un controllo ActiveX dipende dalla misura a cui l'autore di controllo implementato il supporto per la visualizzazione da destra a sinistra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato non è uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>valore proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>proprietà viene modificata una modifica a livello di codice o l'interazione dell'utente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> appropriati <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> per supportare il testo da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>è impostato su `No`, il valore restituito è uguale al `align` parametro passato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> appropriati <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> per supportare il testo da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>è impostato su `No`, il valore restituito è uguale al `align` parametro passato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona il controllo e tutti i controlli figlio per il fattore di scala specificato.

trans-unit.source: The Scale method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di scala adatta il controllo in scala specificato `factor`.

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre Ridimensiona tutti i controlli figlio in modo ricorsivo se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, questo metodo chiama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>per ridimensionare ogni controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> contenente i fattori di scala orizzontali e verticali.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona il controllo e degli eventuali controlli figlio.

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: Il rapporto da utilizzare per la scalabilità.

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Scala l'intero controllo e degli eventuali controlli figlio.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala verticale.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che determina il ridimensionamento dei controlli figlio.

trans-unit.source: If the ScaleChildren property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà ScaleChildren `true`, quindi il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>metodo verrà chiamata in modo ricorsivo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>metodo di ciascuno dei relativi controlli figlio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ScaleChildren always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre l'implementazione predefinita di ScaleChildren `true`.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override ScaleChildren to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: Le classi derivate possono eseguire l'override di ScaleChildren per restituire `false` per indicare che il ridimensionamento non deve essere eseguito sugli elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child controls will be scaled when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*> method on this control is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i controlli figlio verranno ridimensionati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>metodo su questo controllo viene chiamato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Scala la posizione, dimensione, spaziatura e margini di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo è di livello superiore, il percorso del controllo non verrà ridimensionata.

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Non consente una scalabilità elementi figlio o delle dimensioni dei controlli automaticamente ridimensionati.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: È possibile omettere il ridimensionamento in qualsiasi direzione modificando il valore della `specified` parametro.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Fattore in base al quale verrà ridimensionati l'altezza e larghezza del controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valore che specifica i limiti del controllo da usare per definirne le dimensioni e posizione.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non è pertinente per questa classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non è pertinente per questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Il fattore di scala verticale.

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Attiva il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Select attiva il controllo se il controllo `Selectable` bit di stile è impostato su `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, è contenuto in un altro controllo e tutti i controlli padre sono visibili e abilitati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli Windows Form nell'elenco seguente non sono selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli derivati da controlli nell'elenco anche non saranno selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando è presente alcun collegamento presente nel controllo)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Attiva un controllo figlio.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, specifica la direzione nell'ordine di tabulazione da cui selezionare il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: Il `directed` e `forward` parametri vengono utilizzati dai controlli contenitore.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `directed` parametro è impostato su `true`, `forward` parametro viene valutato per determinare il controllo da selezionare.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando `forward` è impostato su `true`, viene selezionato il controllo successivo nell'ordine di tabulazione; quando `false`, viene selezionato il controllo precedente nell'ordine di tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>metodo attiva il controllo se il controllo `Selectable` bit di stile è impostato su `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, è contenuto in un altro controllo e tutti i controlli padre sono visibili e abilitati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli Windows Form nell'elenco seguente non sono selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli derivati da controlli nell'elenco anche non saranno selezionabili.

trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando è presente alcun collegamento presente nel controllo)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per specificare la direzione del controllo da selezionare; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per spostarsi in avanti nell'ordine di tabulazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per spostarsi all'indietro nell'ordine di tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: Attiva il controllo successivo.

trans-unit.source: The SelectNextControl method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SelectNextControl attiva il controllo successivo nell'ordine di tabulazione, se il controllo `Selectable` bit di stile è impostato su `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, è contenuto in un altro controllo e tutti i controlli padre sono visibili e abilitati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli Windows Form nell'elenco seguente non sono selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: I controlli derivati da controlli nell'elenco anche non saranno selezionabili.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or SelectNextControl methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(quando è presente alcun collegamento presente nel controllo) quando si modifica lo stato attivo dalla tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), chiamando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o metodi SelectNextControl, o impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà sul form corrente, gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>è impostata su `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>vengono soppressi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> in corrispondenza del quale iniziare la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per spostarsi in avanti nell'ordine di tabulazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per spostarsi all'indietro nell'ordine di tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include nested (children of child controls) child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per includere annidati (figlio di controlli figlio) i controlli figlio; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to continue searching from the first control in the tab order after the last control has been reached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per continuare la ricerca dal primo controllo nell'ordine di tabulazione dopo avere raggiunto l'ultimo controllo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Invia il controllo nella parte posteriore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene spostato nella parte posteriore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo è un elemento figlio di un altro controllo, il controllo figlio viene spostato nella parte posteriore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo è un controllo di primo livello, questo metodo non funzionerà correttamente a meno che il controllo è attivo.

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: Controllo di primo livello è un controllo, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, ovvero non è un figlio di un altro controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo attivo è un controllo visibile che contiene lo stato attivo di input.

trans-unit.source: To use the SendToBack method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare il metodo SendToBack con un controllo inattivo, principale, chiamare innanzitutto il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>metodo sul controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Imposta un valore che indica il comportamento di un controllo quando il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>proprietà è abilitata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Imposta i limiti del controllo per la posizione e dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valore della proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valore della proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valore della proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Imposta i limiti specificati del controllo per la posizione e dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valore della proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valore della proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>
